uk.co.unitycoders.pircbotx.commandprocessor

Class CommandProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.unitycoders.pircbotx.commandprocessor.CommandProcessor

  • public class CommandProcessor
extends Object
    centrally managed command parsing. This class is responsible to breaking IRC messages into commands which the bot can understand. It contains a list of modules and the methods which are tagged with the command annotation. Classes must be registered with the Command Processor in order for the processor to recognise them as commands.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandProcessor

        public CommandProcessor(List<BotMiddleware> middleware)
        Create a new command processor. This will create a new command processor and will initialise the regex pattern the bot will use to match commands. It will also create the maps needed to store information about the commands.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(String name,
                     Module target)
        Register a new module and extract it's commands. This method will look at target and process any method which has been annotated with the command annotation. It will then remember the module and command names for use when processing messages. The module's name will need to be put before any command. This is to prevent two modules conflicting with the same named commands.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the module
        target - the module object

      • getReverse

        public List<String> getReverse(String action)
        Lookup what plugins are capable of responding to a given action.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to respond to
        Returns:
        the list of plugins which recognise this command

      • alias

        public void alias(String name,
                  String oldName)
        Alias an existing module to a new name. This function will let you define an alias for an existing module. Passing null as either argument is not permitted.
        Parameters:
        name - the new name to use as the alias
        oldName - the existing name of the module
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if module is not defined or alias already exists

      • remove

        public void remove(String command)

      • tokenise

        protected List<String> tokenise(String message)

      • processMessage

        public List<String> processMessage(String inputMessage)

      • invoke

        public void invoke(Message message)
            throws Exception
        Process an IRC message to see if the bot needs to respond. This method takes an IRC message and splits it into it's component parts. if the action is valid it will then call the call method to process the event.
        Parameters:
        message - the event to be processed
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getModules

        public Collection<String> getModules()
        Get a list of modules registered with the command processor.
        Returns:
        the list of module names

      • getCommands

        public Collection<String> getCommands(String moduleName)
        Gets a list of commands which are registered with the command processor
        Parameters:
        moduleName - the name of the module to get the commands from.
        Returns:
        the list of command names, or null if command doesn't exist.
